favourite.article: I can't wait as a created one to be there in the uncreated sphere.

Born in England, son of Presbyterian parents, he became a minister and writer. He attacked the established church and was one of the 1st Nonconformists to improve hymn singing in their gatherings. Of all his poems, only this one has remained. - Songs of the Spirit by Martin
Beautiful... "through eternal love". The sacrifice God provided makes us able to abide in the "uncreated" light. Blessings.
